t: Amazon Ends Sponsored Brands Campaign Drafts Starting June 23, 2024 | Swipe Insight
s: June 11, 2024 - Starting June 23, 2024, the option to save Sponsored Brands campaigns as drafts will be discontinued. t: Amazon listing keeps going in draft but no errors show
